extraSections.text:
# Introducing Friendly Sea Creatures

We share NEAR's visions and build on them. It is important to us that this project revolves around being open and accessible to anyone who wants to be a part of it. As a strong group we wanna make an environment that is cooperative rather than competitive‚Äîwithin and outside of the Friendly Sea Creatures. So that we can make the best of all the possibilities NEAR is offering.

We will be the only source of information you need to stay up to date with everything going on in the NEAR NFT space. Our website NEAR Ocean will provide you with all relevant notifications to be on time for everything you want.

# Post Mint Schedule

### Rebrand to NEAR Ocean

NEAR Ocean will be a comprehensive news platform for the NEAR NFT Ecosystem. Find all your desired information about the space in one place.

### NEAR News Bot
